turkish_example_sentence: Ben güzel bir resim yapsam, sergiyi kazanabilirim.
english_example_sentence: If I were to make a beautiful painting, I could win the exhibition.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я сделал красивую картину, я мог бы выиграть выставку.
